cards.name: Background
cards.content:
Our platform is easy to integrate into any level of experimental science education, the only you need to know, as a user, is the experimental method.  The entire UI is design around cards, which are supposed to emulate pages in a lab notebook. You can add, remove, or edit cards as you please. 
Explore our platform (and business model) using the cards below.  If you accidentally delete something, don't worry, just refresh the page!

cards.name: Problem
cards.content: Hands-on experimental science is too inaccessible to K-12 education.  Many educators and students are frustrated with current hands-on experimental science equipment.  They are too expensive to purchase in bulk, too complex to use as a tool (rather its own lesson) and too fragile to be used by students.

cards.name: Relationship
cards.content: By providing a hardware device which would provide students with the option to easily create a diverse set of experiments as well as a software platform to allow for peer collaboration and online integration, hands-on experimental science education can become more accessible to the next generation of students, educators and hobbyists.
